title: The Soviet Circus
brief_description: A behind-the-scenes look at the everyday training and performances put on by the Moscow Circus School. The Soviet Circus encompasses acrobatics, lion- taming, magic and, of-course, the hilarious world of the clowns. The video captures all the glamour and excitement of this world famous circus troupe.
